member.name: ID2D1DCRenderTarget.BindDC
member.summary: Binds the render target to the device context to which it issues drawing commands.
member.param: The device context to which the render target issues drawing commands.
The dimensions of the handle to a device context (HDC) to which the render target is bound.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1DCRenderTarget
member.summary: Issues drawing commands to a GDI device context.
